attr.title: Arcade Spirits
attr.desc: Arcade Spirits is a Visual novel that takes place in an alternative future where the Video Game Crash of 1983 did not happen. You will be working at an Arcade, and who knows, maybe romance would bloom?
attr.inst: Download Arcade Spirits from Steam (https://store.steampowered.com/app/910630/Arcade_Spirits/), Get the "game" folder from the files, and put that inside the ports/arcadespirits/ folder.
attr.inst_md:
**Notes**:
If you want to name your player character something other than Ari Cader, connect a Keyboard to your device

Also Please note that at the current time, the best way to leave the game is to rely on the in-game quit menu


**Thanks to**:
[Fiction Factory Games](https://www.arcadespirits.com/) for creating this lovely game

The testers for helping getting this port to it's current state
